channel.title: [PI] No clip / Clip while following!? Please help!
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I have the problem that if you follow someone you can just walk straight trough the walls and such, I have looked in the walking.java and walkingcheck.java but I can't really find anything on it and neither did I find a place in the game where you cant follow someone and just walk trough everything so I suppose I'd have to create a way to prevent this from happening, however if anyone knows what to do / knows a tutorial would be great!
Thank you,
Unique

item.title: [PI] No clip / Clip while following!? Please help!
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Thanks but thats a incorrect link :O?

  1. That’s an error.
    The requested URL /runescape-development/google/tutorials/305276-pi-clipped-following.html was not found on this server. That’s all we know.

Read full topic
